title: KL-CRM: Local-First Customer Relationship Management
shortDescription: A comprehensive CRM system built with Python, DuckDB, and Streamlit for local-first data management
challenge: Building a local-first CRM that processes Excel/CSV data, normalizes it into a relational schema, provides AI-driven contact enrichment, and serves interactive dashboards - all while maintaining data privacy and working entirely offline.
solution: Developed a modular architecture using DuckDB for local data storage, Streamlit for the web interface, and integrated AI enrichment via pluggable adapters. Implemented comprehensive data governance with immutable snapshots and audit logging.
